On 01/05/2011 12:04 AM, Greg Lu wrote:
>
> Is there currently a way to stop crawling a specific host in a running 
> job? I can pause or restart the job from the latest checkpoint, but 
> starting over again isn't really an option.
>

Editing configuration while running Heritrix by committing a checkpoint, 
terminating the job, tearing down, editing crawler-beans.cxml (or 
seeds.txt), building, choosing the checkpoint to build from, and 
launching the job.


you can refer to Gordon's reply: 
http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/6913 to know 
the two options to modify a running crawl.
